title: 282.281 REPURCHASE SUBJECT TO EXISTING LEASES.
text: Until repurchased all parcels of land subject to the provisions of sections 282.241 to 282.324 shall be subject to lease under the provisions of sections 282.01 to 282.271, and any repurchase of such land under sections 282.241 to 282.324, shall be subject to the provisions of any such existing lease.
